room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by Mind Maze Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I took my daughter and a few friends for her birthday. They did the mad scientist and loved it. Fun experience.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by Mind Maze Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Amazing fun. Booked with my son, daughter and her boyfriend. We did the Mad Scientist room. It was great fun and the guys running it were so fun and friendly. I highly recommend trying this. I'm going to come back with my other daughter in December. So happy to support a great local company.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by Mind Maze Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Wow! We had an amazing experience! The theme was Mad Scientist and Nurse Ben and Patrick took great care of us! The clues were seriously tough but awesome! I couldn't have had a better time. We went as a group of 6, and every person played a part in solving our puzzle. I can't wait to go back and try the Wild West theme as well as the Secret Agent theme.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by Mind Maze Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: First experience doing an escape room and had a blast! The owner was super cool and the room we did (Mad Scientist) was super fun!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Scientist" by Mind Maze Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Our family went with a group of six to do the Mad Scientist room. This was our first escape room experience and we absolutely loved it. We made it out with 4 mins remaining! The staff couldn't be more friendly. We are planning our next trip soon to experience another room!
